articles.author: F1
articles.title: Ricciardo to replace De Vries at AlphaTauri from the Hungarian Grand Prix - Formula 1
articles.description: Daniel Ricciardo will make a sensational return to front-line Formula 1 racing at the upcoming Hungarian Grand Prix, with the Australian set to replace Nyck de Vries at the AlphaTauri team for the rest of the season.
